entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this evening then to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
